languages.text: {n}Мутант в богатых одеяниях что-то мычит. Вы замечаете стежки суровой нитью на обезображенном лице: ретивые слуги поспешили заткнуть осужденного раньше времени и зашили ему искривленный рот.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Врешь, были у меня наследники!" {n}Кричит старик, брызгая тягучей слюной.{/n} "Мои мальчики, сыновья мои! Но ваше похабное вольнодумство погубило их! Вы забрали их волю, извратили, уничтожили! Дети не должны рассыпаться раньше своих родителей, не должны! Это мне полагалось умереть первым, не им..."
traits.speaker: FW_CulpritNoble

languages.text: {n}The richly garbed mutant moans something. You notice stitches on his disfigured face: the zealous servants were evidently in a hurry to silence the condemned man early and sewed his twisted mouth shut.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мутант в богатых одеяниях что-то мычит. Вы замечаете стежки суровой нитью на обезображенном лице: ретивые слуги поспешили заткнуть осужденного раньше времени и зашили ему искривленный рот.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The richly garbed mutant moans something. You notice stitches on his disfigured face: the zealous servants evidently rushed to silence the condemned man early and sewed his twisted mouth shut.{/n}

{n}The richly dressed mutant moans something. You notice the stitches of harsh thread on his disfigured face: the zealous servants rushed to silence the dissident early and sewed up his twisted mouth.{/n}

languages.text: {n}那个衣着华丽的变种人在嗫嚅着什么。你注意到，他残损的脸上满是针脚。很显然，那些热切的仆役迫不及待地把他扭曲的嘴巴缝了起来，想让这个死刑犯赶紧闭嘴。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The richly garbed mutant moans something. You notice stitches on his disfigured face: the zealous servants were evidently in a hurry to silence the condemned man early and sewed his twisted mouth shut.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那个衣着华丽的变种人在嗫嚅着什么。你注意到，他残损的脸上满是针脚。很显然，那些热切的仆役迫不及待地把他扭曲的嘴巴缝了起来，想让这个死刑犯赶紧闭嘴。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El mutante de ricos ropajes masculla algo, pero no lo entiendes. Adviertes unas puntadas en su rostro desfigurado: está claro que sus fanáticos sirvientes se apresuraron a silenciar al condenado cosiéndole la boca.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The richly garbed mutant moans something. You notice stitches on his disfigured face: the zealous servants were evidently in a hurry to silence the condemned man early and sewed his twisted mouth shut.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El mutante de ricos ropajes masculla algo, pero no lo entiendes. Adviertes unas puntadas en su rostro desfigurado: está claro que sus fanáticos sirvientes se apresuraron a silenciar al condenado cosiéndole la boca.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zengin giyimli mutant, inleme sesleri çıkarıyor. Biçimsiz yüzünde dikişler olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Gayretkeş hizmetkârlar, belli ki hükümlü adamı erkenden susturmak için aceleyle çarpık ağzını dikmiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The richly garbed mutant moans something. You notice stitches on his disfigured face: the zealous servants were evidently in a hurry to silence the condemned man early and sewed his twisted mouth shut.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zengin giyimli mutant, inleme sesleri çıkarıyor. Biçimsiz yüzünde dikişler olduğunu fark ediyorsun. Gayretkeş hizmetkârlar, belli ki hükümlü adamı erkenden susturmak için aceleyle çarpık ağzını dikmiş.{/n}

languages.text: {n}裕福な身なりをした変異体は何かを嘆く。彼の変形した顔の縫い目に気づく。熱狂的な使用人が明らかにその犯罪者を黙らせるために殺到して、彼の歪んだ口を縫って閉じた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The richly garbed mutant moans something. You notice stitches on his disfigured face: the zealous servants were evidently in a hurry to silence the condemned man early and sewed his twisted mouth shut.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}裕福な身なりをした変異体は何かを嘆く。彼の変形した顔の縫い目に気づく。熱狂的な使用人が明らかにその反体制派を黙らせるために殺到して、彼の歪んだ口を縫って閉じた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le mutant richement vêtu marmonne des propos incompréhensibles, attirant votre attention sur les sutures pratiquées à même son visage défiguré : visiblement, les zélés serviteurs des pouvoirs en place s'étaient empressés de réduire le condamné au silence en lui cousant les lèvres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The richly garbed mutant moans something. You notice stitches on his disfigured face: the zealous servants were evidently in a hurry to silence the condemned man early and sewed his twisted mouth shut.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Mutant mit der teuren Kleidung stöhnt auf. Du bemerkst Nähte auf seinem entstellten Gesicht. Die fanatischen Diener haben den Verurteilten offenbar in Eile zum Schweigen gebracht, indem sie seinen entstellten Mund zugenäht haben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The richly garbed mutant moans something. You notice stitches on his disfigured face: the zealous servants were evidently in a hurry to silence the condemned man early and sewed his twisted mouth shut.{/n}
